name: WEBSITE_URL_MAX
description:
/**
 * Represents the maximum length allowed for a website URL.
 *
 * This limit ensures that the URL entries remain manageable and compatible with database and UI constraints.
 */

name: USERNAME_MIN
description:
/**
 * Represents the minimum length allowed for a username.
 *
 * This limit helps ensure that usernames are meaningful and provide enough characters for identification.
 */

name: USERNAME_MAX
description:
/**
 * Represents the maximum length allowed for a username.
 *
 * This limit helps ensure that usernames are not overly long, which could impact database storage and UI design.
 */

name: EMAIL_MIN
description:
/**
 * Represents the minimum length allowed for an email address.
 *
 * This limit is set to ensure the basic structure of an email address is met, allowing for validation of email inputs.
 */

name: EMAIL_MAX
description:
/**
 * Represents the maximum length allowed for an email address.
 *
 * This limit ensures that email addresses are compatible with database and email service constraints while being long enough to accommodate most email formats.
 */

name: MOBILE_MIN
description:
/**
 * Represents the minimum length allowed for a mobile number.
 *
 * This limit is typically set to accommodate the country code plus the standard number length in most regions.
 */

name: MOBILE_MAX
description:
/**
 * Represents the maximum length allowed for a mobile number.
 *
 * This limit allows for international numbers which may include country codes and additional digits.
 */

name: PASSWORD_MIN
description:
/**
 * Represents the minimum length allowed for a password.
 *
 * This limit helps ensure that passwords are strong enough to provide security against unauthorized access.
 */

name: PASSWORD_MAX
description:
/**
 * Represents the maximum length allowed for a password.
 *
 * This limit is set to balance between security and usability, ensuring passwords are not too cumbersome for users while providing adequate security.
 */

name: EXTERNAL_AUTH_ID_MAX
description:
/**
 * Represents the maximum length allowed for an external authentication ID.
 *
 * This limit ensures compatibility with various external authentication services and database constraints.
 */

name: IMAGE_FILE_ID_MAX
description:
/**
 * Represents the maximum length allowed for an image file ID.
 *
 * This limit ensures compatibility with storage systems and helps maintain efficient database indexing.
 */

name: IMAGE_SHAREABLE_LINK
description:
/**
 * Represents the maximum length allowed for a shareable link of an image.
 *
 * This limit accommodates potentially long URLs that may include tracking and routing information.
 */

name: IMAGE_DOWNLOAD_LINK
description:
/**
 * Represents the maximum length allowed for a download link of an image.
 *
 * This limit allows for the inclusion of necessary query parameters and other URL modifications.
 */

name: HEX_COLOR_CODE_MAX
description:
/**
 * Represents the maximum length allowed for a hexadecimal color code.
 *
 * This includes the '#' symbol followed by six characters representing the color in RGB format.
 */
